thread.title_full: business trip March 1 2017 - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Edward P M
title: business trip March 1 2017
text: Good location for Hilton honors members just off the main Manhattan 8th Avenue area but quiet for a good stay. Good selection of neighborhood restaurants nearby within walking distance. Easy access to a range of oretail outlets for travel needs while staying in the NYC area.
